name: Cliffside Defender
description:
This game was created in ten days by a solo developer for the VimJam 2 game jam.

Tools Used
  • Godot
  • Blender
  • Aseprite
  • Audacity
External Assets Used
  • Squares Bold Font made by Jovanny Lemonad at 1001fonts.com
  • Sanchez Font Family made by LatinoType at 1001fonts.com
  • Crosshair sprites made by Kenney Game Assets at opengameart.org
  • "Perpetual Tensions" by Zander Noriega at opengameart.org
  • "Night Prowler" by Section31 at opengameart.org
  • "Loading Screen Loop" by Brandon Morris at opengameart.org
  • Sound effects from Kenney Game Assets, Michel Baradari, and dklon at opengameart.org
